name: CyberBonk!
description:
CYBERBONK! is a fun local multyplayer game taking place in a futuristic environment. Battle to collect the most coins and use a variety of items to prevent the other players to collect your coins. Jump from building to building in a voxel cyberpunk city.

The project has been starting during the Orbital Game Jam (EPFL).

Instructions

Join the game by pressing any button.

[ SPACE ] to jump

[ LEFT CLICK ] to attack

[ Q ] to grab an item
